channel.title: [Added] Create Org. Identifier XI-IATI-WAI For The Dutch Wash Alliance International
channel.description:
It is proposed to add a new organistion identifier for the dutch Wash Alliance internation on the IATI Organisation Identifier Codelist at http://iatistandard.org/202/codelists/IATIOrganisationIdentifier/
The details to be added are:
Code: XI-IATI-WAI
Name: WASH Alliance International
Description: The WASH Alliance International is a consortium of member organisations in the Netherlands and partner organisations worldwide, working on sustainable WASH for everyone.
URL: ... http:// www.wash-alliance.org
